00073 
00076   void NormSquaredSmoother::optimize_vertex_positions(PatchData &pd, 
00077                                                       MsqError &err)
00078   {
00079       //default the laplacian smoother to 3 even for 2-d elements.
00080       //int dim = get_mesh_set()->space_dim();
00081       //size_t dim = 3;
00082   
00083     MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "NormSquaredSmoother::optimize_vertex_positions" );
00084 
00085   
00086       // does the Norm squared of T smoothing
00087     MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator free_iter(pd, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00088     free_iter.reset();
00089     free_iter.next();
00090       //m is the free vertex.
00091     size_t m=free_iter.value();
00092       //move vertex m
00093     norm_squared_smooth_mesh(pd, m, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00094       //snap vertex m to domain
00095     pd.snap_vertex_to_domain(m,err);
00096   
00097   }
00098

00103   }

00108   }
00109   
00110   bool NormSquaredSmoother::norm_squared_smooth_mesh(
00111     PatchData &pd, size_t free_index, MsqError &err)
00112   {
00113       //get vertex and element arrays
00114     MsqVertex* verts=pd.get_vertex_array(err);MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00115     MsqMeshEntity* elems=pd.get_element_array(err);MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00116     size_t num_elements = pd.num_elements();
00117       //matrix to store a map for the given corner
00118       // (element/vertex combination) that maps the
00119       //vertex to 0 and the other vertices to 1,2,3
00120     int local_matrix_map[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00121     size_t local_matrix_map_length=MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT;
00122     size_t local_matrix_map_used=0;
00123     Vector3D new_position;
00124       //will be used as the denominator
00125     double scale_value = 0.0;
00126     size_t i, j, k;
00127       //Z and Z^(t)
00128     Matrix3D z_mat_transpose;
00129     Matrix3D z_mat;
00130       //array of Y's... one for each vertex in this corner.
00131     Matrix3D y_mat[4];
00132       //c_(j,k) for the vertices
00133     double c_scalars[4];
00134     vector<size_t> elems_verts;
00135       //loop over the two or three dimensions
00136     for(i=0;i<num_elements;++i) {
00137         //actually get the map for this corner...
00138       local_matrix_map_used = elems[i].get_local_matrix_map_about_vertex(
00139         pd, &verts[free_index],local_matrix_map_length, local_matrix_map,err);
00140       MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00141         //get a vector of the vertex indices for this element
00142       elems[i].get_vertex_indices(elems_verts);
00143         //get the W array for this elements
00144       int elem_idx = pd.get_element_index(&elems[i]);
00145       const TargetMatrix* W = pd.targetMatrices.get_element_corner_tags(
00146         &pd, elem_idx, err );MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00147         //initial c_scalars to 0.0 and calculate Y for each vertex in the
00148         // this corner.
00149       for(j=0;j<local_matrix_map_used;++j){
00150         c_scalars[j]=0.0;
00151         if(local_matrix_map[j] < 0){
00152           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid index returned from MsqMeshEntity.\n",
00153                           MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00154           return false;
00155         }
00156           //tmp_mat=W[local_matrix_map[j]];
00157         inv(z_mat,W[local_matrix_map[j]]);
00158           //inv(z_mat, I);
00159         z_mat_transpose=transpose(z_mat);
00160         matmult( y_mat[j], z_mat, z_mat_transpose);
00161           //std::cout<<"\n j "<<j<<"\n";
00162           //std::cout<<"\n"<<y_mat[j]<<"\n";
00163       }
00164         //0 case (c_scalars[0])
00165       for(j=0;j<3;++j){
00166         for(k=0;k<3;++k){
00167           c_scalars[0] += ((y_mat[0])[j][k]);
00168         }
00169         c_scalars[0] += ((y_mat[j+1])[j][j]);
00170       }
00171         //1, 2, and if need 3
00172       for(j=0;j<3;++j){
00173         for(k=0;k<3;++k){
00174           c_scalars[j+1] -= (((y_mat[0])[j][k]) + ((y_mat[j+1])[k][j]));
00175         }
00176         c_scalars[j+1] += ((y_mat[((j+2)%3)+1])[((j+1)%3)][((j+2)%3)]);
00177         c_scalars[j+1] += ((y_mat[((j+1)%3)+1])[((j+2)%3)][((j+1)%3)]);
00178       }
00179         // accumulate this corner's contribution to the numerator
00180         // and the denominator...
00181       for(j=1;j<local_matrix_map_used;++j){
00182           //std::cout<<"c_k ("<<j<<") ="<<c_scalars[j]<<"\n";
00183           //std::cout<<"x_k ("<<j<<") ="<<verts[elems_verts[ (size_t) local_matrix_map[j]]]<<"\n";
00184       
00185         new_position+=verts[elems_verts[ (size_t) local_matrix_map[j]]]
00186           *c_scalars[j];
00187       }
00188 //     std::cout<<"c_k (0) ="<<c_scalars[0]<<"\n";
00189       scale_value+=c_scalars[0];
00190     
00191     }
00192     if(scale_value==0.0){
00193       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid accummulation          .\n",
00194                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00195       return false;
00196     }
00197       //divide the new position by the denominator and get the
00198       // negative sign into the equation.
00199     new_position/=(-1.0*scale_value);
00200       //debug
00201       //MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Original position "<<verts[free_index]<<"\n";
00202       //MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "New position "<<new_position<<"\n";
00203       //actually set the new position
00204     verts[free_index].set(new_position);
00205   
00206     return true;
00207   }
00208
